text: The 1926 Tour de Hongrie was the second edition of the Tour de Hongrie cycle race and was held from 27 to 29 June 1926. The race started and finished in Budapest. The race was won by László Vida. ==Route== {| class="wikitable" |+ Stages of the 1926 Tour de Hongrie |- ! scope="col" | Stage ! scope="col" | Date ! scope="col" | Route ! scope="col" | Distance ! scope="col" | Winner |- ! scope="col" | 1 | style="text-align:right;" | 27 June | Budapest to Debrecen | | |- ! scope="col" | 2 | style="text-align:right;" | 28 June | Debrecen to Miskolc | | |- ! scope="col" | 3 | style="text-align:right;" | 29 June | Miskolc to Budapest | | |- | colspan="3" style="text-align:center" | Total | colspan="2" style="text-align:center" | '''''' |} ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Team ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | BTC | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | Világosság KK | style="text-align:right;" | + 13' 25" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | JKK | style="text- align:right;" | + 13' 54" |} |} ==References== 1926 Tour de Hongrie Tour de Hongrie
